summary: she was shocked when her stolen car was located and returned to her . police found her car after receiving a tip from a man who recognized the vehicle as schoenig . the brand had been stolen from her driveway monday . becky schoenig of st. louis , missouri , was shocked when she realized her brand new 2015 ford fusion had been stolen . as the car pulled up , schoenig noticed that the rims had been spray painted red .

- Car thieves pimp out Ford Fusion with red rims and detailing

- New smoothie named after man who located car
explain: The "bling" aspect refers to the fact that the stolen car was returned with modified rims that had been spray painted red.

The aspect highlights that car thieves are not only stealing cars, but also customizing them to make them more appealing to potential buyers on the black market.

Explained: Car thieves add style to their stolen Fords by painting the rims red and detailing the cars to enhance their value on the black market.

Restate the aspect with an example.
Explained: A core idea of the aspect is that car thieves are not only stealing vehicles, but also enhancing their value through customization, as seen in the theft of a red-rimmed 2015 Ford Fusion in St. Louis.

The core idea of the aspect "Car had strong smell of cigarettes and marijuana" is that the stolen car had an unpleasant odor that belonged to the combination of cigarette and marijuana smoke.

The given aspect suggests that a new smoothie has been named after the man who located the stolen car. This core idea implies that the man's actions were recognized and appreciated by the society, and to honor him, a new smoothie has been named after him.
